p: OEP was conducted based on the method by Crichton et al. ( 2017). They also introduced a method for samples with high organic content, but only the OEP part was tested in this study in order to avoid including many steps, thus preventing possible loss of MPs (Mintenig et al. 2017). The procedure tested previously with seawater was used for spiked and sieved (> 250 Î¼m) influent samples and method introduced for sediment samples was used for spiked sludge samples as Crichton et al. ( 2017) described.
